Plot: A documentary that explores the question: In the age of manscaping, metrosexuals, and grooming products galore - what does it mean to be a man?
Title: Mansome
Actors: Jason Bateman, Judd Apatow, Will Arnett, Adam Carolla
tomatoConsensus: Mansome is a threadbare documentary with little insight into modern male maintenance, with useless celebrity interviews padding an already slim runtime.
